name: Five Days of Hell
description:
Five Days of Hell - a game where you survive in a harsh sandy canyon. Here you will meet anomalies, monsters and very few resources for survival, and at night demons wake up who want to kill you. Activate all 4 altars within 5 days and go to the main boss of the game. There is very little time!

At the moment the game has:
- 5 bosses.
- Several types of weapons.
- Open world.
- Hard hardcore mode.
